body.name: Stylus (5 Pcs), 2-in-1 Stylus Pen for Touch Screen, High Precision and Sensitivity, Suitable for iPhone/ipad/Android Tablets, Compatible with All Touch Screens (Black/White/Blue/Rose Gold/Silver)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 41 mins
features: 【Stylus for Touch Screen】This stylus can be used on all touch screens, designed to replace your fingers, the stylus can free up your fingers and provide higher sensitivity and response on the screen.

【2-in-1 Stylus Pen】Tablet pen for touch screen, made of lightweight alloy, no need for Bluetooth connection or charging, ready to use after opening the package, comfortable in hand, sturdy, durable and anti-aging, so you can use it anytime, anywhere Easily capture inspiration and make everything feel like writing on paper, giving you a more accurate writing/drawing/touching experience.

【High Accuracy and High Sensitivity】The stylus adopts a flexible transparent disc tip that can flexibly fit on the screen without leaving disconnected lines on your tablet or phone, providing better flexibility and accuracy, Allowing you to see exactly where the mark is and giving an accurate point, while the rubber tip and disc tip can give you two different touch experiences.

【Compatibility and multi-purpose】Universal stylus, suitable for touch screen devices (Apple, Samsung, Moto, Lenovo, Xiaomi, etc., and also compatible with major operating systems, such as: Google, Android, Microsoft, etc.), you can use it like a real You can use our stylus to write on drawing applications, take notes, read news, play games, etc., just like any other touch screen device.
【What you get】You get 5 different colored stylus pens and a portable replacement set of 6 rubber nibs and 3 clear nibs in one package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stylus! Great Value
reviews.reviewText: This is a great stylus! It works great and I am so happy I bought it, especially for the low price. Comes is a cute box and is packaged so nicely. Has extra tips and extra mesh end as well as a grip sleeve you can use. Charge lasts a long time and is does recharge quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I dropped this in the toilet and it still works
reviews.reviewText: I have bought a number of styluses that mimic the look of the super-expensive pencil. None of them have all of that flagship stylus's features, but at 1/5 of the cost (or less) that trade-off is just fine with me. (A stylus is something that I am going to eventually lose, so paying $100+ for one isn't an option for me.) This stylus is the first one, however, that I can say that I've gotten wet and it still worked. Not just wet, actually. It didn't just get rained on, I dropped it in the toilet, and it was completely submerged for a second or so before I fished it out. And this guy still worked! A prior one by a competing manufacturer had a similar incident in the bathtub and immediately stopped working. This company makes good styluses in my opinion. Regrettable company name, but Chinese firms aren't ever great at that kind of thing. Good product. Works well, and obviously very durable. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had one that I lost, and I replaced it with this one. I don't like it as well as the old one (which I found immediately after I ordered this one, of course). It doesn't work quite as well, and doesn't feel quite as good in my hand, but it still works well enough. I'm keeping it as a spare in case I lose my favorite one again - which will most likely happen, because I'm just like that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing cost effective replacement for apple pencil
reviews.reviewText: I thought my 2nd gen apple pencil broke so I wanted to find a cheap replacement for the few months of school I have left. Turns out it was not broken, but I haven't switched back to using it since I love this one.Pros:-Works just as well as my real apple pencil-Charges very quickly and seems to hold comparable charge to real pencil-Easy charging, my real apple pencil only charges on the side of my iPad but my case is so big it takes me like 10 tries to get it to charge magnetically-Love the light indicator to tell you in real time when it's time to charge (rather than the pen dying on me mid sentence)-Comes with replacement tips and a rubber grip, which costed me an extra $20 for my other pencilCons:-Occasionally glitches (writing not smooth if you write too fast, turns off while writing) twice in the 2 weeks I've had it (I'm writing for about 5-6 hrs per day)-Replacement tips don't fit the real apple pencil, seems to only fit this one pencilVery glad I bought it when it was sub$20 and would highly recommend to anyone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Actually Works Very Well
reviews.reviewText: When. Ordered this I expected to be disappointed. Well it actually works very well and meets my needs. Nicely packaged with instructions, charging cable, extra tips and an email address for support (which I didn’t need to use). It has LEDs to let you know the charging status and remaining power status. I have an iPad Pro 11” 3rd gen. It’s responsive, it has palm rejection, and the angle of the tip affects the width. It’s holds to side of iPad magnetically. I am not an artist so this does when I wanted it to do. If you are an artist or want it to charge from the iPad directly or need the double tap feature then the Apple Pencil would be better - but it’s 10x the Price. I hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Battery Life Issue
reviews.reviewText: I brought this pencil 6 months ago and it was great but now, I'm having issues with the battery. I noticed that the pencil is dying a lot quicker (even though I am using it the same amount as before). It is also having problems charging. The green blinking light no longer shows up when it is plugged in. I wonder if there is a warranty for this product or I might just have to buy another pencil (but probably with a different company as a 6 month battery life is soo not worth it).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, works well
reviews.reviewText: No major complaints! Charges quickly and holds charge well, connects easily and works accurately on my iPad pro 2020, and doubt I could find anything as good or better for such a low price.
I like these, I am forever loosing them or they fall between the cushions of my living room chair, getting a pkg of 5, price was reasonable, and they arrived in record time.
Je les aime beaucoup très précis et sensible.

I bought this for my 13 year old granddaughter to use with her first iPad. She said that it works well and holds a charge for a very long time. Downside is that it needs to be charged in the wall or with a portable charging hub as opposed to charging an Apple stylus right on the iPad. From what she has said, it holds a charge far longer than my Apple Stylus. I think she would recommend it to others.
Fonctionne très bien pour moi , acheter 2 fois.

I’ve been using this pen a few months and works great. I had no issues with it. Good charge on it and charges very fast. I love the weight of it when writing. I only use it to write and sometimes draw plans. Software is very nice and useful for me. I have an iPad 9th gen and the pen was plus play but does not work with my iPhone XR
